basic.description:
This activity-based course will afford students the opportunity to work with community physical activity programs for persons with disabilities and relate class theory from KNPE 333/3.0 Physical Activity for Persons with Disabilities to practical implementation. Students will also have a weekly laboratory component.
NOTE    Transportation and other costs (e.g. required Criminal Checks) are the responsibility of the student.
basic.subject: PACT
basic.title: Practicum in Physical Activity for Persons with Disabilities
